bibl.title: Actes du XVe Congrès International de Papyrologie. II
bibl.note: 6. A fragmentary letter of recommendation. - 7. A letter of recommendation. - 8. A letter from Philinos (?) to Zenon. - 9. A memorandum to Zenon from Theodoros. - 10. A demand for wine delivery. - 11. An account of a flock of leased out sheep. - 12. Account of sheep. - 6-12: Philadelphia, iii cent. B.C.
Actes du XVe Congrès International de Papyrologie. II (Bruxelles, 1979) pp. 52-59 et pll. I (b) et VI-VIII.
